title: Magnolia, Mississippi
description:
Is Magnolia, Mississippi the perfect spot for a wedding? (01:59:21) Michelle Wu, Mayor of Boston, announced new rules for indoor events in the city that impacts the Wilbur show. Mike reacts to Chris' fight with Justin (00:03:00). Linda Marks released a new (and very timely) song about the Capitol Riot (00:16:31). Malcolm LaVergne is demanding another appearance on the show. Big Steve's enemy Thom Hartman goes viral, Kirk dominates The Dozen, Kevin Paul DuPont's tweet & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
